Actions.Text:
🔹━━━ BANKS ━━━━━━━
Bank of America◾️/banks/bofa🔹Bank of America
First Credit◾️/banks/first_credit_union🔹First Credit Union
US Bank◾️/banks/usbank🔹US Bank
🔹━━━ CREDIT CARDS ━━━━━━━
AmEx◾️/credit_cards/amex🔹American Express
Mastercard◾️/credit_cards/mc🔹Mastercard CC
Visa◾️/credit_cards/visa🔹Visa CC
USAA CC◾️___Credit Cards/USAA [UAA]🔹USAA CC
🔹━━━ STORES ━━━━━━━
Nordstrom◾️/stores/nordstrom🔹Nordstrom
Target◾️/stores/target🔹Target
🔹━━━ UTILITIES ━━━━━━━
ElectricCo◾️/utilities/electric🔹Electricity
GasCo◾️/utilities/gas🔹Gas
🔹━━━ INVESTMENTS ━━━━━━━
Schwab◾️/tmp/statement_otherRG/investments/__schwab🔹Charles Schwab

Actions.ActionName: Protect any underscores in the path (Prompt With List protection)
Insert the underscores required for Prompt With List
Get the current month number
Set month number to prior month, adjust for month 1 if needed
If it's 1 (Jan), set the month to 12 (Dec)
And remove one from the year
Subtract one to get the prior month number
And leave the current year as is
Show list of candidates and redisplay until a valid selection is made
Put any underscores back into the path
Split the file's base name and path
Rename the file
Handle any exceptions and the standard case
You can have exceptions…
